TIME.comment: time stamp corresponds to the hour and represents binned data [30,30) minutes before and after the hour

TEMP_count.long_name: number of observations in the water column

PSAL_count.long_name: number of observations in the water column

_global.title: Gridded Time Series Product: {VoI} interpolated at {site_code} to fixed depth bins at 1-hour time intervals, between {time_min} and {time_max} and {depth_min} and {depth_max} meters.
_global.abstract: Gridded Time Series Product: This file contains {VoI} readings from all instruments deployed at the {site_code} mooring site. The source of the values is the Hourly Time Series Product where TIME is fixed to 1-hour interval. The variable values are interpolated to a fixed depth bins using a linear interpolation between consecutive existing depths. Only values flagged as 1 or 2 are used in the interpolation.
_global.lineage: The Variable of Interest (VoI) is produced by sequentially interpolating linearly the individual values into pre-defined depth bins using the 1-hour binned data from the Hourly Time Series Product. The number of instruments used for the interpolation at each timestamp is recorded in the VoI_count variable. If less that two instrument readings are present in the timestamp, fill values are stored in all depth bins. The resulting variable has dimensions TIME and DEPTH.
